_header: Heavy thoughts and long deep sighing
Note:
Cf. Seaton (1961)
XSeaton, Ethel. Sir Richard Roos, c. 1410-1482: Lancastrian Poet. London: R. Hart-Davis, 1961, 152.
Versification: — eight-line — ababbcbc with some interlocking rhymes
_description: An to his Mistress: a love epistle — three 8-line stanzas

BodRawC813.First Lines:
hevy thoughtes and houge depe sykyngpensyffe partyng puttethe me to
                    payne…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…as knoweth owr lorde swete Iesuewhome preserue my loue wher
                    euer she goo
